displayAddress: 102 OLD BROMPTON ROAD, SOUTH KENSINGTON LONDON SW7 3RD
detailedDescription: Location: Situated in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea within the vibrant South Kensington district, the building occupies a very prominent corner position, at the junction with Clareville Grove and Onslow Gardens. Nearby occupiers include H.R Owen Ferrari , The Royal British Society of Sculptors , Little Waitrose , Shell , Joe & The Juice , Chucs Café , Wright Brothers and Strutt & Parker . Besides it’s vicinity to the World renowned residential catchment of Chelsea, the area is adorned with boutique hotels, such as the likes of Blakes , The Kensington , Curio Collection by Hilton , Number 16 and The Bentley. Accommodation: The property consists of E class accommodation (historically occupied by a gastro pub), over ground, basement and first floor levels. The upper levels at 2 nd and 3 rd floors are one-bedroom apartments, presently accessed via an internal staircase accessed from the first floor and an external staircase from Clareville Grove. The building has been partly stripped back to shell in preparation for our clients’ extensive plans. Existing approximate floor areas & dimensions are as follows: Basement 91.04 Sq m 980 Sq ft Ground Floor 205.04 Sq m 2,207 Sq ft 1 st Floor 142.98 Sq m 1,539 Sq ft 2 nd Floor 75.99 Sq m 818 Sq ft 3 rd Floor 67.94 Sq m 731 Sq ft Total Area 582.99 Sq m 6,275 Sq ft Architects have drawn up plans which show a new internal staircase and self-contained entrance to the flats, can easily be created from Clareville Grove (plans available upon request). This offers a good opportunity to consider upgrading/ extending the residential offering in the building or to seek change of use to the likes of hotel accommodation (subject to planning). There is also great potential to extend/ amalgamate the existing first and second floor terrace areas and this could significantly benefit the likes of a restaurant or other commercial uses.

LOCATION Tufnell Park Road, situated in North London, providing easy access to a wide range of amenities and public transport links. DESCRIPTION This self-contained space is arranged over ground & lower ground.
